title: 如何禁止当前世界刷怪
author: Mr.zyz
txt_content: 如何禁止当前世界刷怪

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
装了多世界的话可以使用指令
/mv modify set monsters false

replies.author: 小蒋来了
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 柚子呦
replies.txt_content:
不管你用什么多世界插件
/gamerule doMobspawning false
这个指令都有效

replies.author: linsmc
replies.txt_content: 进入要设置的世界/gamerule doMobSpawning false
